# Verify.IsNotNull method

Throws InvalidOperationException if the parameter is null.

```csharp
public static void IsNotNull(object obj)
```

| --- | --- |
| obj | The parameter to check. |

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| InvalidOperationException | *obj* is null. |
